title: Cyber_Alien
author: Cyber_Alien
content: Hello there, dear community.I'm sure some of you guys have been fooled by your friends and possibly all of this nonsense journalism.Some people believe Bitcoin is dead, and others believe the process is slow. Let me tell you, those forks have duped you.I'm not saying this to inspire you or anything. The point of writing this is to inform all of you fiat bros and sissies that Bitcoin is the hope.Let me explain why you should stop being skeptical of Bitcoin. Bitcoin is not centralized (it does not have a central authority)."I knew the majority of your friends would have called it a Ponzi scheme!" They'd say that's why I don't invest in it. Look at it, everything is going to zero. Many Bitcoin supporters hold opposing views on the currency. Some people invest in it, most likely because they hear good things about bitcoin. I'd like to tell you that Bitcoin is the antidote to money corruption. Perhaps because it is something completely new and amazing, but people fail to recognize it as a means of eradicating corruption in our society. There is no cause for alarm, most likely because they have no knowledge of how the network was implemented. They are easily misled. So let me tell you the most amazing thing about Bitcoin. You can travel anywhere in the world with just 12 words stored in your brain. We have money that is visible to everyone on the planet. Everyone can keep track of any transaction,very secure and does not involve a third party. Bitcoin held by someone else is not yours. So, no manipulation or corruption.That is why you must trust the system and refrain from being fooled by friends.
